name: CHILDREN'S HEALTH FUND
sampleDescriptions:
Reauthorizing of CHIP funding
Funding for Community Health Centers and National Health Service Corps
Protection of levels of non-defense discretionary spending in FY 17 and FY 18 budget proposals.

Uphold Bipartisan Budget Agreement by rejecting a FY 2018 rescission package that reduces funding for CHIP.

Uphold the Bipartisan Budget Agreement.
Increased allocations to subcommittees with jurisdiction over children's programs.
Increase non-defense discretionary to negotiated cap of $597 billion in 2019.
